name: Odbresource
tagline: A Resource and Realm for running OrientDB as an embedded graph database in Tomcat
body:
# OdbResource for OrientDB
OdbResource is a library containing implementations of a connection pool and Tomcat authentication realm for embedded OrientDB graph databases. In an ideal world this will be replaced by something more tightly integrated with OrientDB, but this is sufficient for a proof of concept.

[Releases](https://github.com/skwidge/OdbResource/releases) contain the OrientDB libraries and their dependencies as well.

[Find the User Guide here.](doc/)

[Find the API documentation here.](doc/api/)

[Find the discussion of the purpose of this project here.](doc/whitepaper.html)

OdbResource is released under the [Apache 2.0 License](http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0) the same as [OrientDB](http://orientdb.com/download/)
